name: Orthopedist
description: Specializes in diagnosing and treating conditions of the bones, joints, and muscles, including fractures, arthritis, and sports injuries.

name: Cardiologist
description: Expert in heart and blood vessel health, providing care for conditions like hypertension, arrhythmias, and heart disease.

name: Dermatologist
description: Focused on the health of skin, hair, and nails, treating conditions such as acne, eczema, and skin cancer.

name: Neurologist
description: Specialist in disorders of the nervous system, including headaches, seizures, and neurodegenerative diseases.

name: Pediatrician
description: Dedicated to the health and well-being of children, offering preventive care and treatment for various childhood illnesses.

name: Psychiatrist
description: Focuses on mental health, diagnosing and treating conditions like depression, anxiety, and bipolar disorder.

name: Endocrinologist
description: Expert in hormone-related disorders, managing conditions like diabetes, thyroid issues, and metabolic disorders.

name: Ophthalmologist
description: Specialist in eye care, diagnosing and treating vision problems, cataracts, glaucoma, and other eye conditions.

name: Gastroenterologist
description: Focused on digestive health, treating disorders of the stomach, intestines, and liver, including IBS and hepatitis.

name: Pulmonologist
description: Specialist in respiratory health, managing conditions like asthma, chronic bronchitis, and lung disease.
